hadiths.text: It was narrated that 'Aishah said:"Women used to pray fajr with the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ), and when he said the taslim they would leave, wrapped in their Mirts, unrecognizable because of the darkness

chapter.ara-name: باب الْوَقْتِ الَّذِي يَنْصَرِفُ فِيهِ النِّسَاءُ مِنَ الصَّلاَةِ
chapter.eng-name: The time when women should depart after praying
